titles.title: Taconite Research Act of 2003

A bill to authorize the Economic Development Administration to make grants to producers of taconite for implementation of new technologies to increase productivity, to reduce costs, and to improve overall product quality and performance.
Taconite Research Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Taconite Research Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Economic Development Administration to make grants to producers of taconite to implement new technologies to increase productivity, to reduce costs, and to improve overall product quality and performance.
